Line 38: Line 38:
Declan returns on the day Ryan is found guilty of Mark's murder. He comforts Faye on the courtroom steps and offers to help fund an appeal against Ryan's conviction. Declan is later shocked when Natasha later confesses to Mark's murder. He apologizes to Nathan for believing he was Mark's killer and makes him an offer. Because Natasha could not benefit from Mark's will after confessing to his murder, the money would be split between Faye, Ryan, Nathan, Will and Maisie. If Nathan could convince Natasha to sell Home Farm and her 49% of the business to Declan then he would give Nathan the money and enable him to move away from the village with Maisie and Will and make a fresh start. Nathan, however, refuses point blank to sell Home Farm to Declan, despite being unable to get any better offers. Later [[Ella Hart]] turns up at ''Home Farm'' giving Nathan an offer after he accepts, Ella makes herself at home, much to Declan's fancies but little does Nathan know that Ella is actually Declan's wife and that they have schemed Nathan into giving them ''Home Farm''.
Declan returns on the day Ryan is found guilty of Mark's murder. He comforts Faye on the courtroom steps and offers to help fund an appeal against Ryan's conviction. Declan is later shocked when Natasha later confesses to Mark's murder. He apologizes to Nathan for believing he was Mark's killer and makes him an offer. Because Natasha could not benefit from Mark's will after confessing to his murder, the money would be split between Faye, Ryan, Nathan, Will and Maisie. If Nathan could convince Natasha to sell Home Farm and her 49% of the business to Declan then he would give Nathan the money and enable him to move away from the village with Maisie and Will and make a fresh start. Nathan, however, refuses point blank to sell Home Farm to Declan, despite being unable to get any better offers. Later [[Ella Hart]] turns up at ''Home Farm'' giving Nathan an offer after he accepts, Ella makes herself at home, much to Declan's fancies but little does Nathan know that Ella is actually Declan's wife and that they have schemed Nathan into giving them ''Home Farm''.
â
Later in November Ella returns home with their daughter [[Mia Macey]] to find Declan in a clinch with [[Alicia Gallagher]].Also in November 2010 Declan gave [[Dale Head]] to [[Hazel Rhodes]] so that she could turn it into a suitable home for her son [[Jackson Walsh]] who is parralysed after a nasty train crash. On the 21 December 2010 Declan's unwanted father, [[Dermot Macey]] came to stay for Christmas organised by Ella, but before he arrived at [[List of residences in Emmerdale#Home Farm|Home Farm]], Declan saw him in the bus shelter and paid him so that he would not be staying, but when Declan arrived back home, Dermott was sitting with Ella and Mia. On the 31 December 2010 Declan witnessed Mia kissing [[Adam Barton]], which didn't make Adam's girlfriend [[Scarlett Nicholls]] very happy and Declan told Ella to take Mia home.
+
Later in November Ella returns home with their daughter [[Mia Macey]] to find Declan in a clinch with [[Alicia Gallagher]].Also in November 2010 Declan gave [[Dale Head]] to [[Hazel Rhodes]] so that she could turn it into a suitable home for her son [[Jackson Walsh]] who is parralysed after a nasty train crash. On the 21 December 2010 Declan's unwanted father, [[Dermot Macey]] came to stay for Christmas organised by Ella, but before he arrived at Home Farm, Declan saw him in the bus shelter and paid him so that he would not be staying, but when Declan arrived back home, Dermott was sitting with Ella and Mia. On the 31 December 2010 Declan witnessed Mia kissing [[Adam Barton]], which didn't make Adam's girlfriend [[Scarlett Nicholls]] very happy and Declan told Ella to take Mia home.
[[Katie Sugden]] who works for Declan was given time off after being heled captive by [[Nick Henshall]], so he got a replacement for her and told her to return whenever she wanted to. His PA [[Nicola King]] was also given time off when her husband [[Jimmy King (Emmerdale)|Jimmy King]] went missing, so he got Mia to be his temporary PA. In February 2011 [[Sam Dingle]] told Declan that one of the walls has fallen down and that he needs someone to help him do it, so Mia suggested that her on/off lover Adam could help Sam with it, which didn't make Adam's dad [[John Barton (Emmerdale)|John Barton]] a happy person because Adam was missing so much time off work.
[[Katie Sugden]] who works for Declan was given time off after being heled captive by [[Nick Henshall]], so he got a replacement for her and told her to return whenever she wanted to. His PA [[Nicola King]] was also given time off when her husband [[Jimmy King (Emmerdale)|Jimmy King]] went missing, so he got Mia to be his temporary PA. In February 2011 [[Sam Dingle]] told Declan that one of the walls has fallen down and that he needs someone to help him do it, so Mia suggested that her on/off lover Adam could help Sam with it, which didn't make Adam's dad [[John Barton (Emmerdale)|John Barton]] a happy person because Adam was missing so much time off work.
